item.title: IT Girls: Build a JavaScript Infinite Runner
item.description: I developed this workshop for La-WIT annual IT Girls program. The workshop was meant to introduce area middle school girls to JavaScript using the p5.js library. The workshop has a workbook as well as an accompanying website. By the workbook’s end, you’ll have built a working game with JavaScript! .
